plot outline: New Delhi-based Anushka Walia, who lives with her widowed mother, gets a phone from her frightened sister, Ahana Warda, from Goa. Shortly thereafter a male comes on the phone and informs her that Ahana is in the mental asylum after being arrested for killing her husband, Ravi, and sister-in-law, Nishita. Anushka's mother had not approved of her daughter marrying resort-owner, Ravi, and as a result they had not spoken to each other for many years. Anushka, however, departs for Goa and meets with the investigating CBI Officer, Ranvir, but is unable to see nor speak with Ahana who has apparently disappeared. Her investigations will pit her against an unknown entity from the Warda residence, and will entrap her in a horrific nightmarish world from which there is no escape.
title: Rokkk

synopsis: A woman, Anushka, is sent to a mental hospital, after being charged with the murder of her husband and sister-in-law. The woman has been possessed by the spirit of a girl whose ghost lived in the new home the three moved into on the couple's first anniversary.Anushka's sister Ahana leaves her home in Delhi to see he sister at the hospital. When she arrives, she discovers that her sister has run away. Ahana meets with a Tantrik (practitioner of black arts), who advises her that her sister's house was haunted and that she is now possessed.
